channel.title: LeRoy S. McQuay
channel.description: A perosnal blog of my life

item.title: Beloved Fiance Enjoys My Company
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.description: I hope that this upcoming weekend will be more pleasant than the previous weekends. I enjoyed the company of my fiance. My puppy dog, Winter, enjoyed seeing me as I am away for an extended period. Perhaps I can see about my fiance and me spending quality time together by watching a movie we both may enjoy.

item.title: Relaxation Feels Wonderful
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.description: Today was a lovely day for relaxation; the weather was splendid, and it offered promising outlooks for tonight. Notably, the sky was clear; not a single rain cloud was in sight. I mean, I would feel happy if the rain stopped for once, but it seems like that is slim compared to the previous weeks.

item.title: An Introduction to Racism
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.description: People across the globe misuse the term racism and racist on a daily basis. The word has lost its meaning since using the word when someone opposes their views or opinions. People forget that people do not need to agree with them and are not required to agree with everyone.

item.title: Veteran Travel To Louis A. Johnson VA Medical Center
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.description: Today was a lovely day for travel on the way up to Clarksburg, WV. My journey was to the Louis A. Johnson VA Medical Center in Clarksburg, WV. Even though the sky was full of clouds; the weather was permissible for travel through the state. Not to mention, my journey was exquisite as I got […]

item.title: Lovely Day For Ice Cream
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.description: Enjoying a delightful treat of ice cream with love while enjoying the weather.

item.title: A Subreddit Whose Reputations Succeeds Them.
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.description: It must be a sad world not to know the difference between two subjects. It appears that a community is failing to acknowledge the difference between two set of terms, quarreling due to the nature of their inhabits. It is saddening that people forgot their language barrier and understood of such clause. A dialogue between community and member is sad to see when they do not know how to speak to each other.

item.title: Top 5 Fountain Pens For Beginners
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.description: We have gathered a list of fountain pens that are great for those who are beginning the hobby. We have placed the pens in order of which ones are best for beginners to the least for beginners. We recommend starting at a low-end pen before going to a high-end pen.

item.title: We Must Fight For Our Veterans
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.description: Freedom is not free as it has a price attached. Our men and women give up their lives so we can be free. Without the price of liberty, we have no freedom and can’t enjoy our lives. Remember the next time you see a veteran to say thanks. We need to fight for our veterans.

item.title: Switching To Another Host
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.description: Was having too many issues with Dreamhost. So, I decided to change hosting providers. I can’t have my sites moving slow or showing errors due to misconfigurations of the host. A limit of 256mb of ram is not enough for a website.

item.title: Short Biography
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.description: LeRoy S. McQuay is a developer with expertise in coding, PHP, and WordPress. In the past five years, he has focused on WordPress within the website industry. Some typical projects include Xensor Community, Breast Cancer Awareness, and Xensor Nightshade.
